Sentencas: In this paper, the characteristics of the processing are introduced.
Titulo: Research Progress on Polyacrylamide Gel Method

Sentencas: The main factors that influence the polymerization, such as temperature, the ratio of monomer to cross-linker and chelation, are summarized.
Titulo: Research Progress on Polyacrylamide Gel Method

Sentencas: The applications in the synthesis of high temperature superconductor, thermoelectric oxides, solid oxide fuel cells material and fluorescent nano-powders are reviewed.
Titulo: Research Progress on Polyacrylamide Gel Method

Sentencas: Finally, the perspectives of the polyacrylamide gel method in the near future are also brought forward.
Titulo: Research Progress on Polyacrylamide Gel Method
